intro: Psychotria neurothrix, commonly known as the Red-veined Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its striking red veins on its leaves, which contrast with its dark green foliage. It produces small, white flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Psychotria neurothrix is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and understorey habitats.
